categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Star Squadron was a starfighter squadron that flew for the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

Equipped with B-wings, Star Squadron's craft were painted with white stripes on the undersides of their horizontal wings and along both sides of the vertical wing, simulating rays coming from the fuselage. The fighters of this unit were also armored to minimize damage and had reinforced hulls, and compared to Lancer Squadron, had more accurate but less powerful weaponry.
